Package pacman.util

Class MapPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.util.MapPainter
  • public class MapPainter
extends java.lang.Object

    MapPainter

    A MapPainter is an object of utility to painter a Map to a Pane.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Song Zhang
    See Also:
    Map, Pane
